name: Generate The Day
description:
The generator has broken, and the world is plunged into darkness! The remaining robots have collected around the few remaining power generators, and if they leave for too long, they run out of power. Play as a lone robot set on finding all the generator parts, and restoring light to the world!

Note: For better performance, please use the native builds instead of the WebGL one :3

Controls:

WASD: Move

E: Interact

Return/Enter: Scroll text boxes
